variants.desc:
An automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolfs will use their chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

skills.name: Felling Order
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to Bleed the hit target. If the hit target is not Shielded, then a random ally of theirs suffers "Dismantle" for 1 time.

skills.name: Lock On Target
skills.desc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

variants.name: Automaton Direwolf (Bug)
variants.desc:
A false projection produced by compromised codes. The original reference entity is an automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolf will use its chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

skills.name: Felling Order
skills.desc: Deals massive Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict Bleed with every hit to this target.

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Targeting Order
skills.desc: Locks on to 2 targets and casts Felling Order on them in the next action.

variants.name: Automaton Direwolf (Complete)
variants.desc:
A complete projection produced by compromised codes. The original reference entity is an automaton pieced together with Old World technology. This rare type of humanoid automaton is equipped with a chainsaw on its right arm, presumably used for mining or construction operations.
In combat, Automaton Direwolf (Complete) will use its chainsaw to Bleed enemies, dealing DoT.

skills.name: Felling Order
skills.desc: Deals Physical DMG to a single target, with a chance to inflict Bleed with every hit to this target.

skills.name: Lock On Target
skills.desc: Locks Onto a single target. The next action on the target will cast "Felling Order."

skills.name: Targeting Order
skills.desc: Locks on to 2 targets and casts Felling Order on them in the next action.

skills.name: Teamwork Order
skills.desc: Locks on to 2 targets and casts Felling Order on them in the next action. At the same time, makes Automaton Grizzly enter the Charge state, which will cast Purge Order on all targets in the next action.

skills.name: Disintegration Order
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.

skills.name: Dismantle
skills.desc: Deals minor Physical DMG to a single target, with a high chance to inflict 1 stack of Bleed.
